recipesJson.name: SBIC
recipesJson.author: ID10-T
recipesJson.description: Mustard Milk with the %'s swapped. Call me a heretic but I like it better this way.

reviews.text: I like this better than mustard milk also. Wish I'd thought of trying this sooner.
Heretic!  Comparing it to Mustard Milk after ~2 weeks steeping, I like this one better.  Decent vape.
